meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>constant</kanji> <kanji>star</kanji> is the kind that stays in one place. It's just a regular <vocabulary>star</vocabulary>, like the north star or our sun, not a comet or an asteroid.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
